mapper.insert: insert into exhibition(author_no, subject, content, start_date, end_date, type) values(#{author_no}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{type})
mapper.select: select no, author_no, subject, start_date, end_date, type from exhibition where author_no=${param1} and end_date > date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into work(exhibition_no, work_subject, work_thumbnail, work_content) values(${exhibition_no}, #{work_subject}, #{work_thumbnail}, #{work_content})
mapper.update: update work set work_subject=#{work_subject}, work_content=#{work_content}, work_thumbnail=#{work_thumbnail} where no=${no}
mapper.select: select count(a.no) from exhibition a join work w on a.author_no=${member_no} and a.no = w.exhibition_no and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') >= a.start_date

select a.no, w.exhibition_no, w.work_subject, w.work_thumbnail, a.start_date, a.end_date, w.work_content, w.write_date from exhibition a join work w on a.author_no=${member_no} and a.no = w.exhibition_no and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') >= a.start_date order by a.start_date desc limit ${recordPerPage} offset ${offsetIndex}

select e.no, e.subject, e.content, w.work_thumbnail , e.author_no from work w join exhibition e on e.no = w.exhibition_no where date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= e.start_date and e.end_date >= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') group by e.no order by e.start_date limit ${recordPerPage} offset ${offsetIndex}
select no, exhibition_no, work_subject, work_thumbnail, work_content from work where no=${no}

select count(e.no) cnt from exhibition e join author a on e.author_no = a.no
and e.subject like '%${searchWord}%'
and a.author like '%${searchWord}%'
where date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= e.start_date and e.end_date >= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')

select e.no eno, e.author_no author_no, e.subject subject, e.content content, e.start_date start_date, e.end_date end_date, w.no wno, w.exhibition_no exhibition_no, w.work_subject work_subject, w.work_thumbnail work_thumbnail, w.work_content work_content from exhibition e join work w on e.no = w.exhibition_no and e.no=#{param1}

select e.no, e.subject, e.content, a.author, e.start_date, e.end_date from exhibition e join author a on e.author_no = a.no
and e.subject like '%${searchWord}%'
and a.author like '%${searchWord}%'
where date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') >= e.start_date and e.end_date >= date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') order by a.author limit ${recordPerPage} offset ${offsetIndex}
